name: Je T'aime Ballerina Shoes
description:
Ballerina Tie Slippers/Shoes. 
Handmade ballerina baby shoes/slippers, embellished with buttons and felt, these shoes are really adorable. The ankle tie strap can be removed if preferred. I have hand sewn the words JeT'aime in metallic blue coloured thread on the toe of slippers. 
These slippers are 100% cotton and the love hearts are made of felt. The ideal gift as baby's first shoe.

Due to the ankle tie being removable, please keep out of reach of children and take extra care when tying around baby's ankle.

PLEASE MEASURE BABY'S FEET, FROM HEEL TO TOE BEFORE PURCHASING, AND ALLOW ROUGHLY ABOUT 1CM ROOM FOR TOES

Shoes measures approximately: 
10.2cms from heel to toe. 
Age 3-6months

Handwash in luke warm water and drip dry only.
